community1.name: HubSpot
community1.description: A community for students who have completed or are applying for HubSpot co-ops. Discuss interview tips, tech stack insights, and what itâ€™s like to work in a collaborative, fast-paced marketing tech company.

community2.name: Microsoft
community2.description: Connect with fellow students and alumni who have interned or co-oped at Microsoft. Share advice on technical interviews, team culture, and transitioning into full-time roles.

community3.name: Goldman Sachs
community3.description: Network with Northeastern students and alumni in finance, risk analysis, and software roles at Goldman Sachs. Share insights on the interview process and company culture.

community4.name: Mass General Brigham
community4.description: For students in healthcare, data, and IT roles within MGB. Share insights on healthcare tech, patient data projects, and navigating co-ops in clinical and research environments.

community5.name: Pre-Health & Medical Co-ops
community5.description: A space for students interested in healthcare, pre-med, nursing, or research co-ops. Discuss hospital experiences, lab rotations, and application strategies for medical or healthcare-related co-ops.

community6.name: Deloitte
community6.description: A hub for students who have worked in consulting, analytics, or audit co-ops at Deloitte. Share insights about consulting projects, work culture, and recruitment tips.

community7.name: Pre-Law & Policy
community7.description: For students exploring law, government, or policy-oriented co-ops. Discuss LSAT prep, legal internships, and networking within the legal field.
